name: BEST WESTERN PREMIER Crown Chase Inn & Suites

reviews.text: I am a business traveller who has gotten pickier with age. Imagine my happiness at finding: Friendly & knowledgeable staff; spacious, comfortable room; LOTS of fluffy pillows; COFFEE (more than one packet); Fluffy, absorbabent towels in the bathroom; nice toiletries; a nifty seat in the shower (leg prop for leg-shaving). The breakfast bar and made-to-order omelet was a nice touch as well. Oh, did I mention the bar? (For those so inclined)
reviews.title: One of the best!

reviews.text: My wife and I were very impressed with the cleanliness of the hotel and the friendliness of the front desk. The room was spacious, bed super comfortable, and the walk-in shower was fantastic. Whether you need just an overnight stay or something a little longer, this hotel would be an excellent choice.
reviews.title: Overnight Stay
It will "WOW" you!!
reviews.text: Many years ago I traveled alot while in the USAF and ended up staying in Best Westerns all over the USA, so I've never been a big fan of the regular Best Western. I'm still not. However after my wife cajoled and harassed me enough I finally made a reservation at a Best Western Premier last summer, and we were hooked. I made another reservation Feb 23rd at the Best Western Premier in Denton. The good thing is all the Premier rooms are basically the same. And that quality has sold me on Best Western Premier. Ethernet internet I like for info protection--its there. A sofabed with a chaise lounger at one end--there, too. A bed that rivals our Tempur-pedic at home?--Amazingly its there, as well. Stack that with HD TV with 4 HBO and 4ESPN and both the wife and I have something to argue about (usually we don't have enough amenities to argue about at all!!). Now for my favorite part; breakfast. Buffet with a real yogurt section and a variety of fruit to add, scrambled eggs, sausage links, hash browns o'brian, and a made to order omelet that is stuffed, and I mean "stuffed", with almost anything you would want in an omelet. The only downside is there aren't many of these Premiers across the country. But you can believe if this is the standard with which all are run I will be planning trips in the future by the where the Best Western Premiers are at.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was large, comfortable, nicely decorated, clean--in other words, all you could ask
reviews.title: By far the best hotel we stayed in.

reviews.text: for. We also lucked out with a view over the pool--pretty night and day. Loved the beautiful
reviews.title: It was awesome and roomy!

reviews.text: I had not stayed at a Best Western for years and would not have stayed here except it was close to where my business meeting was being held. The last time I stayed at a Best Western the rooms resembled that of a typical road side inn. I was totally blown away by the cleanliness, the size of the room, and the great breakfast! The staff was great and It's also an excellent location to restaurants and shopping. I'd definitely recommend this hotel if you're looking for a pleasant stay. If my travels take me back I will definitely return.
reviews.title: Surprisingly Awesome!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: this was our second stay in Denton and from the GM to the cleaning staff the team at BW Premier in Denton make you feel like part of the family.
reviews.title: Feels like Home

reviews.text: Beautiful property throughout. If you have the chance stop in and enjoy the service.
reviews.title: Awesome weekend
Great stay - beautiful property and AMAZING staff!

reviews.text: We have stayed at the Best Western Premier Crown Chase Inn and Suites in the past. As it was then, this stay was once again enjoyable. We were in town for a TWU softball game. We have stayed at many local hotels, and this hotel ranks among the top hotels in Denton. The rooms are large, clean, and comfortable. The cooked to order omelettes and the buffet breakfast were awesome. The pool area is very unique with a rock waterfall. We will stay at this hotel during future trips to Denton.
reviews.title: Another Good Stay.

reviews.text: This hotel was just a one night stay before we picked up a RV from down the road. It was cheap and I was worries about that but I was happy with what we paid for. It had a laundry in the hotel so which was a perfect as we were due a bit of washing! The hotel is right next to a Texas Steakhouse which offers $2 pints and 99c refills! The meals are fantastic! Would go back just for that! Bed comfortable and room is big!
reviews.title: Perfect hotel!

reviews.text: This hotel was so much more than I was expecting - very modern, beautiful updated decor, professional staff, extensive free hot breakfast, fabulous pool area, convenient location with many restaurants within walking distance, sharing the same parking lot. Was amazed with the high ceilings, upscale fixtures in the bathroom, mounted big screen TV, ceiling fan, and extremely comfortable beds with lots of pillows. This was one of the nicest hotels I have ever stayed in, many being much more expensive. Staff was extremely professional at check-in, offered all the necessary information, was friendly and helpful. Breakfast are staff did a great job with the made to order items, keeping the other areas full and clean. Everything about the experience was great, including the rate!
reviews.title: beautiful hotel

reviews.text: The hotel is very clean and the staff will pamper your every need. You must go downstairs and eat the best breakfast you have ever had. I would want my mother to stay here and I only want the best for my mother.
reviews.title: I always stay here if my travels carry me within 50 miles of this hotel.

reviews.text: I have stayed at this hotel a number of times now and am still amazed how nice the entire facility is. I've stayed at 5 star hotels that aren't this nice. The rooms are almost suites with a living/office area with desk and sofa, large flat screen TV, ceiling fans, kitchenette and awesome bathroom.
reviews.title: Excellent Value

reviews.text: Stayed here for 2 nights, and enjoyed my stay. Had a big room with King and sofa sleeper and kitchenette. Everything was new, very clean, modern, and comfortable. They do a great breakfast in the morning, and offer free wifi internet too (although a little slow and spotty in rooms). Easy access to I-35, and surrounded by lots of restaurants and shopping mall. I will be back!
reviews.title: New, modern, great service and location

reviews.text: My week stay here was awesome! Great rooms, great location, and very reasonable price! The breakfast provided was really good! Will be staying here again in April! I would recommend this hotel to all my family and friends!
reviews.title: Staff was great! Rooms were great!

reviews.text: Friendly & knowledgeable staff; spacious, comfortable room; LOTS of fluffy pillows; COFFEE (more than one packet); Fluffy, absorbabent towels in the bathroom; nice toiletries; hot breakfeast bar, they make your eggs to order.
reviews.title: Great Rooms

reviews.text: iF you're looking for a great place to spend the night or two you can't beat this hotel. My husband's eye specialist is in Denton so instead of an early morning drive we spend the night every six months. This is our favorite BW hotel and we've stayed in them from Denton, San Antonio to New Mexico. The staff are all so friendly and welcoming. The rooms are beautiful,spacious and always clean. The bed is the most comfortable ever and it's great having extra pillows.Breakfast is exceptional with made to order eggs available.The front desk also has chips, ice cream and canned drinks for late night snacking. Right outside the front door you'll find 4 restaurants to walk to which is an added bonus of not having to drive to find a place for dinner.
reviews.title: Favorite Best Western Hotel

aka: Best Western Premier Crown Chase Hotel Denton
description: Welcome to the BEST WESTERN PREMIER in Denton Texas. With its savvy architecture and chic design, you are sure to never look at a Best Western the same again.
